caption.p: Anti-inflammatory activities of SBR, MOB, and GenoTX-407. ( A) Cell viability in response to SBR, MOB, and GenoTX407 in the MTT assay. ( B– F) Real-time PCR for checking the mRNA expression of NF-κB ( B), TNF-α ( C), IL-6 ( D), iNOS ( E), and COX2 ( F), normalized to GAPDH. ( G) Inhibitory effect on LPS-induced NO generation. *Significantly different from normal controls ( p < 0.05). # Significantly different from positive controls ( p < 0.05). SBR, Scutellaria baicalensis root; MOB, Magnolia officinalis barks; GenoTX-407, combination of SBR and MOB; LPS, lipopolysaccharide.
